name: 林逾先
objective:
This course teaches students the estimations of time and cost when managing a project, the development of project schedule and budget, and other relevant skills in monitoring and controlling the project. The development of project proposal, feasibility study of project investment, project risk assessment, project interface management, and the role of project manager in a project team within an organization will also be discussed.
本課程教導學生管理一項專案時，有關時間及成本的估計、進度表與預算的編列、以及其他監督控制一項專案進行之相關技巧與應用。專案計劃書的發展、專案投資的可行性分析、專案的風險評估、專案的介面管理，以及專案團隊與專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。
schedule:
1  Introduction (course outlines and class teaching notes)
2  Concept and definition of “project” with its applications
3  Project manager and project team, Project proposal
4  Project investment feasibility and selection criteria
5  Project risk assessment and monitoring
6  Project network representation
7  Instructor out of country on business (No class)
8  Project scheduling based on AOA and AON network
9  Project scheduling based on Gantt chart and activity
   adjacency  matrix
10 Mid-term exam
11 Budgeting and cost control of a project
12 Project scheduling with constrained resource
13 Project resource leveling
14 Project time and cost trade offs
15 Instructor out of country on business (No class)
16 Introduction of Microsoft Project 2008 software
17 Estimation of activity time and the probability of
   project completion within a time frame
18 Final exam
